data.title: Best House Cleaning Services Near San Jose
data.meta_description: Tired of spending your weekends cleaning? Molly Maid of S. Silicon Valley can help! We deliver the best house cleaning services near San Jose, CA.
data.meta_site_name: MOLLY MAID of S. Silicon Valley
data.text:
San Jose House Cleaning

Welcome to Molly Maid of S. Silicon Valley! For several decades, we have been servicing the San Jose and surrounding areas. Our many happy customers would agree that we offer the best house cleaning services around. When you hire us, you’re getting expert home cleaning professionals. You know that when you come home, it will be a sparkling clean house. Our insured maids are reliable and have the skills to meet your satisfaction with our Neighborly Done Right Promise™. Let us take on the dirty work so you can spend more time doing the things you love to do.

Our cleaning services in and near San Jose are customized to meet your needs. Our maids are happy to tackle those hard-to-clean areas of the home, including baseboards, door frames, and bathroom vanities. In addition to regularly scheduled services, we also provide move-in/move-out cleanings as well as thorough one-time cleans and special occasion cleanings. Whether you are moving into your new home or are a landlord between tenants, we think you’ll agree: we offer the best house cleaning services around.

Our Continued Commitment to You

Since 1984, customers around the country have welcomed our trusted cleaning professionals into their homes. Each Molly Maid location is locally owned and operated by people living and working right here in your community.

We know that when you’re looking for the best house cleaning services in or near San Jose, you’re looking for someone who will treat your family like their own. That’s why our cleaning professionals are up to date on all of the latest recommendations to ensure we clean your home to the best of our abilities. Our cleaning procedures are designed with you and your family’s safety, health, and happiness in mind.

We’ve cleaned for over a million customers throughout the country. When you hire Molly Maid, you’re hiring the best house cleaning services in San Jose and the surrounding areas. Rest assured, we will go above and beyond to support you with a worry-free, top-notch cleaning service every time.

Molly Maid of S. Silicon Valley takes our commitment to this community seriously. To give back, we contribute to many local charities, including Next Door Solutions, which supports victims of domestic violence.

Experience the Best Cleaning Services In and Near San Jose

Whether you’re looking for recurring cleaning services, a one-time thorough cleaning, a move-in/move-out clean, we are here to help. Request a clean from our friendly Molly Maid of S. Silicon Valley today!

Our Services

Our San Jose home cleaning services are customized to meet your needs. Our maids are happy to tackle those hard-to-clean areas of the home, including baseboards and bathroom vanities. In addition to regularly scheduled services, we also provide move-in/move-out cleanings. Whether you are moving into your new home or are a landlord between tenants, we can provide you with exceptional service.

Molly Maid of S. Silicon Valley believes in giving back to the community. We contribute to Next Door Solutions which supports victims of domestic violence.

Over our 20+ years of service, we have allowed many more quality time with their family. Get in touch with us today by calling to request a free estimate.

Still have some questions about hiring a professional cleaning company for your San Jose home? Here are some of the most frequently asked questions regarding our maid services.

Can I schedule same-day service?

Yes, providing we have availability in our schedule for that day.

Do you provide carpet cleaning?

Unfortunately, we do not. However, we do vacuum carpets and clean all hardwood flooring.

Can I have the same team every time?

Yes. We make every effort to consistently send the same team to clean your home.

Our busy customers have counted on Molly Maid for the most dependable and trusted residential cleaning solutions since 1984. We provide premium house cleaning services in S. Silicon Valley, and we are proud to have served the area for over 25 years. Our cleaning professionals live in the same communities they serve, so you can always count on hometown service and friendly, professional technicians.

Our house cleaning services do more than eliminate dirt and germs—we use the safest cleaning products that get the job done right. Our house cleaning services in S. Silicon Valley clean for health, as we rely on proven cleaning products for stubborn grime.
